otherNames: ONI ~ 神々山のおなり, Oni: Kamigami Yama no Onari, Oni: Thunder God's Tale
synopsis: One of the free-spirited daughters, Onari, had a unique power yet to be seen by her peers in a world of oddball gods and monsters of the Japanese folklore. Aspiring to be one of the mightiest heroes of her village, she decided to take a journey to discover her own power. However, when a mysterious group of "Oni" threaten her own village, reputed for being peaceful for ages, she also had to rise to the occasion to thwart their attack and protect people of her village
